title: What is the best home theater system in the $200 - $300 dollar range? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the $200-300 dollar range, HTIB surround sound systems usually leave you with more wires than improved sound. In that price range I'd recommend just adding a powered 2.0 or 2.1 speaker system and setting your TV's audio-out to variable level output. ( so the TV remote can control the volume ) I'd strongly recommend the Audioengine A2's ( $200, what I use for my desktop ), or the A5's ( $ 350 ) if you're really looking to treat yourself. http://audioengineusa.com/Store/Audioengine-2http://audioengineusa.com/Store/Audioengine-5

You should look at Panasonic's HTIB (home theater in a box). If your going to pair your system with a TV it may be better of getting the same brand (TV and HTIB) as you will be able to use one remote for both...a big plus.
